channel.title: Ice Barrage
channel.description:
Ok, i have searched every where in this forum and even in the deleted tutorials for a way how to make ice barrage work properly (freeze the person or ncp etc) but have found nothing.
all the ones that i have looked at all ways say the same thing like put castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); somewhere and put someother stuff somewhere else.
by the way im using project16 by wolf for the server and it has all those castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); and other stuff allready in it.
can any one help??? :confused:
PS. im a noob to java but can understand most of it as it is similer to someother program languages that I know

ive searched through all tutorials. i took me two full days just doing it to.

i do what they tell me to do and it still doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Barrage
item.dc:creator: @jammesz jammesz
item.description:
@jammesz wrote:

Sorry it still doesnt work.

when i search for ice barrage in client.java it comes up with 3 results:

1st result

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] > 130)
{
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(15);
startAnimation(1979);
attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); 
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");  
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 130 to cast this spell.");
}
}

2nd result

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage
			if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) {
			stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
			stillgfx(368, absY, absX);
			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);
			teleportToX = absX;
			teleportToY = absY;
	        addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic);
            setAnimation(709);
			} else {
				sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell.");
			}
		}

3rd result

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] > 124)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(565)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(59);
startAnimation(1979);
attackPlayersWithin(369, 59, 30); 
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); 
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 40); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);  
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.");
}
}

really all i want is it to freeze the player/ncp instead of them just moving out of the ice block straight away

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Barrage
item.dc:creator: @IceImp IceImp
item.description:
@IceImp wrote:

[b]Hi,

Try What Mladen Told You ![/b]

Read full topic

item.title: Ice Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Mladen Mladen
item.description:
@Mladen wrote:

Purpose: To Make Barrage Normal

Difficulty: 1

Assumed Knowledge: Finding The Backspace button on ur keyboard.ctrl + f would be nice

Server Base: Pimpscape mostly because the barrage is rong there

Classes Modified: Client.java

Procedure
Step 1: Ok open up Your Client.java

Step 2: Search For “ice barrage” until you see something like this if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 93) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); setAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

Step 3: When You Find It see The stillgfx(370, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); Part . Change it to stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); It will be Normal Now . Save Compile and run

Credits: Me . I dont leach because whats of it … and its a hell easy tut…

Read full topic
